s0660.chinese: 五十六年秋，昭襄王卒，子孝文王立。
s0660.literal: Fifty-sixth year autumn, Duke Zhaoxiang died, son King Xiaowen ascended.
s0660.idiomatic: Fifty-sixth year autumn, Duke Zhaoxiang died, son King Xiaowen ascended.

s0661.chinese: 尊唐八子為唐太后，而合其葬於先王。
s0661.literal: Honored Tang Bazhi as Tang Dowager, and combined her burial with the former kings.
s0661.idiomatic: Honored Tang Bazhi as Tang Dowager, and combined her burial with the former kings.

s0662.chinese: 韓王衰绖入弔祠，諸侯皆使其將相來弔祠，視喪事。
s0662.literal: Han king in mourning clothes entered to offer condolences and sacrifices, all lords sent their generals and chancellors to offer condolences and sacrifices, oversee funeral affairs.
s0662.idiomatic: Han king in mourning clothes entered to offer condolences and sacrifices, all lords sent their generals and chancellors to offer condolences and sacrifices, oversee funeral affairs.

s0663.chinese: 孝文王元年，赦罪人，修先王功臣，褒厚親戚，弛苑囿。
s0663.literal: King Xiaowen first year, pardoned criminals, honored former kings' meritorious ministers, rewarded relatives generously, relaxed hunting parks.
s0663.idiomatic: King Xiaowen first year, pardoned criminals, honored former kings' meritorious ministers, rewarded relatives generously, relaxed hunting parks.

s0664.chinese: 孝文王除喪，十月己亥即位，三日辛醜卒，子莊襄王立。
s0664.literal: King Xiaowen ended mourning, tenth month Jihai day ascended throne, three days Xinchou day died, son King Zhuangxiang ascended.
s0664.idiomatic: King Xiaowen ended mourning, tenth month Jihai day ascended throne, three days Xinchou day died, son King Zhuangxiang ascended.

s0665.chinese: 莊襄王元年，大赦罪人，修先王功臣，施德厚骨肉而布惠於民。
s0665.literal: King Zhuangxiang first year, great pardon of criminals, honored former kings' meritorious ministers, spread virtue generously to relatives and extended favor to the people.
s0665.idiomatic: King Zhuangxiang first year, great pardon of criminals, honored former kings' meritorious ministers, spread virtue generously to relatives and extended favor to the people.

s0666.chinese: 東周君與諸侯謀秦，秦使相國呂不韋誅之，盡入其國。
s0666.literal: Eastern Zhou lord conspired with lords against Qin, Qin sent Chancellor Lü Buwei to execute him, completely took his state.
s0666.idiomatic: Eastern Zhou lord conspired with lords against Qin, Qin sent Chancellor Lü Buwei to execute him, completely took his state.

s0667.chinese: 秦不絕其祀，以陽人地賜周君，奉其祭祀。
s0667.literal: Qin did not cut off their sacrifices, granted Yangren lands to Zhou lord, to maintain their sacrifices.
s0667.idiomatic: Qin did not cut off their sacrifices, granted Yangren lands to Zhou lord, to maintain their sacrifices.

s0668.chinese: 使蒙驁伐韓，韓獻成皋、鞏。
s0668.literal: Sent Meng Ao to attack Han, Han offered Chenggao, Gong.
s0668.idiomatic: Sent Meng Ao to attack Han, Han offered Chenggao, Gong.

s0669.chinese: 秦界至大梁，初置三川郡。
s0669.literal: Qin border reached Daxiang, first established Sanchuan commandery.
s0669.idiomatic: Qin border reached Daxiang, first established Sanchuan commandery.

s0670.chinese: 二年，使蒙驁攻趙，定太原。
s0670.literal: Second year, sent Meng Ao to attack Zhao, pacified Taiyuan.
s0670.idiomatic: Second year, sent Meng Ao to attack Zhao, pacified Taiyuan.

s0671.chinese: 三年，蒙驁攻魏高都、汲，拔之。
s0671.literal: Third year, Meng Ao attacked Wei's Gaodu, Ji, captured them.
s0671.idiomatic: Third year, Meng Ao attacked Wei's Gaodu, Ji, captured them.

s0672.chinese: 攻趙榆次、新城、狼孟，取三十七城。
s0672.literal: Attacked Zhao's Yuci, Xincheng, Langmeng, took thirty-seven cities.
s0672.idiomatic: Attacked Zhao's Yuci, Xincheng, Langmeng, took thirty-seven cities.

s0676.chinese: 魏將無忌率五國兵擊秦，秦卻於河外。
s0676.literal: Wei general Wu Ji led five states' troops to attack Qin, Qin retreated beyond the Yellow River.
s0676.idiomatic: Wei general Wu Ji led five states' troops to attack Qin, Qin retreated beyond the Yellow River.

s0677.literal: Meng Ao defeated, withdrew and left.
s0677.idiomatic: Meng Ao defeated, withdrew and left.

s0678.chinese: 五月丙午，莊襄王卒，子政立，是為秦始皇帝。
s0678.literal: Fifth month Bingwu day, King Zhuangxiang died, son Zheng ascended, this was Qin First Emperor.
s0678.idiomatic: Fifth month Bingwu day, King Zhuangxiang died, son Zheng ascended, this was Qin First Emperor.

s0679.chinese: 秦王政立二十六年，初并天下為三十六郡，號為始皇帝。
s0679.literal: Qin King Zheng ascended twenty-six years, first united the world into thirty-six commanderies, titled First Emperor.
s0679.idiomatic: Qin King Zheng ascended twenty-six years, first united the world into thirty-six commanderies, titled First Emperor.
